snippet: WOODS--Michael F.,of Bronxville, NY on June 19, 2016 at the age of 85. Beloved husband of the late Helen, loving father of Teresa W. (Shaun) Daley, Stephen (Cindy) and Michael (Sherry), devoted grandfather of five. Dear brother of Sr. Mary Denis (Imelda), Connie Fonseca and the late Joan and Patricia. Proud graduate of Regis, Fordham University and New York Law School. He was the former New York State Deputy Commissioner of Commerce and retired as the Vice President of the New York Power Authority. Calling Hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son funeral home, Bronxville between the hours of 5 to 8pm Tuesday. Mass of Christian Burial St. Josephs Church, Bronxville on Wednesday at 10:45am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WOODS, MICHAEL F.
